label: FinancingSummaryDocument
comment: A collection of financing related data that provides an overview of key points.

datatypeProperties.comment: The financed applied rate, expressed as a percentage, in this financing summary document.

objectProperties.comment: The financing financial account, used for managing the line of credit, specified for this financing summary document.
The financial booking related to this financing summary document.
A creditor financial account specified for this trade settlement payment means.
